welcome_message_body: Welcome to Newport Beach! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful coastal city, known for its stunning beaches, vibrant waterfront, and endless opportunities for relaxation and adventure. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything that Newport Beach has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for low-cost airlines such as Southwest and Frontier.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport serves international flights and provides customs and immigration services for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport primarily serves regional flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Chino Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: Compton Airport's main terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
